content: this is a summary of a civil case that took place in the vilnius city district court the court made a final resolution regarding the matrimonial property and financial savings of a couple the court decided that the financial savings accumulated during the marriage will be given to the spouse who held them as personal property the court also declared that the applicant has an obligation towards a creditor a joint stock company due to a car loan agreement the legal text discusses three articles in the civil code related to the deviation of equal shares in community property protection of creditors rights and shareable property the applicant filed for a divorce seeking to establish the residence of their minor children and requesting custody they also asked for child maintenance fees payment for debts related to child maintenance and the division of property including a car the defendant objected and presented a counterclaim for payment of maintenance arrears the court ruled in favor of the applicant on various claims including the establishment of the childrens residence and child maintenance the court ordered the division of property and the payment of costs the defendants counterclaim was dismissed the court allowed one party to take action and dismissed the counterclaim made by the other party the marriage is being dissolved due to fault and the court will divide the property acquired during the marriage the financial savings will be given to one spouse and the personal property of the defendant will be transferred to them the court also ordered the defendant to pay the costs of the proceedings and stamp duty to the state budget
